infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture plant images for disease detection.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to track field zones and GPS coordinates.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select plant images for analysis.
